mapper.sql: WITH writer_reports AS (SELECT DRIVER_ID_FK, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM FROM drive_report_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID_FK = ${submitterIdFk} ORDER BY DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC LIMIT 50 )
mapper.select: SELECT CAR_NO FROM driver_tb WHERE DRIVER_ID IN (SELECT DRIVER_ID_FK FROM writer_reports) GROUP BY CAR_NO LIMIT 10
SELECT FROM_SITE FROM writer_reports GROUP BY FROM_SITE HAVING FROM_SITE != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT TO_SITE FROM writer_reports GROUP BY TO_SITE HAVING TO_SITE != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT ITEM FROM writer_reports GROUP BY ITEM HAVING ITEM != '' LIMIT 10
mapper.sql: WITH join_reports AS (SELECT * FROM drive_report_tb INNER JOIN driver_tb on drive_report_tb.DRIVER_ID_FK = driver_tb.DRIVER_ID WHERE SUBMITTER_ID_FK = ${submitterIdFk} ORDER BY DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC )
